creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red ground with center and edge decorated with stripes of magenta and navy blue; compound warp patterning of imaginative animals and celestial beings in stripes; two 4 selvage pieces with multicolored crochet edging; edge stripe of two figural stripes divided by red and yellow stripe
title: Skirt (Aksu)
